channel.title: Huxley's Blog

item.title: Git Notes
item.description:
<p><code>Git</code>相关介绍、常用命令总结及使用过程中的遇到的相关问题记录</p>
<h2 id="git相关知识" class="heading-element"><span>Git相关知识</span>
 <a href="#git%e7%9b%b8%e5%85%b3%e7%9f%a5%e8%af%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="git工作区域" class="heading-element"><span>Git工作区域</span>
 <a href="#git%e5%b7%a5%e4%bd%9c%e5%8c%ba%e5%9f%9f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><pre class="mermaid">flowchart LR
work[[Workspace
工作区]]
stage[(Stage
暂存区)]
repo[(Repository
版本库)]
remote[(Remote
远程仓库)]

work-->|git add|stage
stage-->|git commit
git commit --amend|repo
stage-->|git restore --staged|work
repo-->|git push
git push -f|remote
repo-->|git reset --soft|stage
repo-->|git reset --hard|work
repo-->|git checkout branch|work
repo-->|git commit --amend|repo
remote-->|git fetch|repo
remote-->|git pull| work
remote-->|git clone| work</pre>
<template>flowchart LR
work[[Workspace
工作区]]
stage[(Stage
暂存区)]
repo[(Repository
版本库)]
remote[(Remote
远程仓库)]

work-->|git add|stage
stage-->|git commit
git commit --amend|repo
stage-->|git restore --staged|work
repo-->|git push
git push -f|remote
repo-->|git reset --soft|stage
repo-->|git reset --hard|work
repo-->|git checkout branch|work
repo-->|git commit --amend|repo
remote-->|git fetch|repo
remote-->|git pull| work
remote-->|git clone| work</template><ul>
<li><strong>工作区</strong>：就是在电脑里能看到的目录。</li>
<li><strong>版本库</strong>：工作区有一个隐藏目录<code>.git</code>，这个不算工作区，而是 Git 的版本库。</li>
<li><strong>暂存区</strong>：英文叫stage或index。对应<code>.git</code>目录下的<code>index</code>文件。</li>
<li><strong>远程仓库</strong>：托管代码的服务器，<code>Github</code>等。</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="文件状态" class="heading-element"><span>文件状态</span>
 <a href="#%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6%e7%8a%b6%e6%80%81" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><pre class="mermaid">flowchart LR
untracked([untracked])
modified([modified
tracked])
staged([staged])
committed([committed])
delete[Deletion of untracked files]
undo[Undo changes to tracked files]

untracked-.->|git clean|delete
untracked-.->|git restore|undo
untracked & modified-->|git add|staged
staged-->|git restore --staged|untracked & modified
staged-->|git commit|committed</pre>
<template>flowchart LR
untracked([untracked])
modified([modified
tracked])
staged([staged])
committed([committed])
delete[Deletion of untracked files]
undo[Undo changes to tracked files]

untracked-.->|git clean|delete
untracked-.->|git restore|undo
untracked & modified-->|git add|staged
staged-->|git restore --staged|untracked & modified
staged-->|git commit|committed</template><ul>
<li><strong>未跟踪（untrack）</strong>：表示文件为新增加的。</li>
<li><strong>已修改（modified/tracked）</strong>：表示修改了文件，但还没保存到git仓库中。</li>
<li><strong>已暂存（staged）</strong>：表示对一个已修改文件的当前版本做了标记，使之包含在下次提交的快照中。</li>
<li><strong>已提交（committed）</strong>：表示文件已保存在git仓库中。</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="git命令" class="heading-element"><span>Git命令</span>
 <a href="#git%e5%91%bd%e4%bb%a4" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-add">git add</a></th>
 <th style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-branch">git branch</a></th>
 <th style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-checkout">git checkout</a></th>
 <th style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-cherry-pick">git cherry-pick</a></th>
 <th style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-clean">git clean</a></th>
 <th style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-clone">git clone</a></th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-commit">git commit</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-config">git config</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-diff">git diff</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-fetch">git fetch</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-init">git init</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-log">git log</a></td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-push">git push</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-rebase">git rebase</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-remote">git remote</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-reset">git reset</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-restore">git restore</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-show">git show</a></td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-stash">git stash</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-tag">git tag</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"></td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<p>多数命令有参数<code>-v/--verbose</code>，会打印更详细的信息。</p>
<h3 id="相关概念" class="heading-element"><span>相关概念</span>
 <a href="#%e7%9b%b8%e5%85%b3%e6%a6%82%e5%bf%b5" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><ul>
<li>
<p><code>HEAD</code> 代表了当前工作目录所指向的当前分支的最新提交。<code>HEAD^</code>表示上一个版本，<code>HEAD^^</code>表示上上一个版本，<code>^</code>个数不限，几个<code>^</code>表示落后<code>HEAD</code>几个版本；<code>HEAD~5</code>表示落后<code>HEAD</code>5个版本。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><code>origin</code>是一个远程仓库的默认名称，这个名称并不是强制的，它代表了远程仓库的地址。<code>origin main</code>和<code>origin/main</code>含义相同，表示远程仓库的<code>main</code>分支。再比如 <code>origin/HEAD</code>表示远程仓库默认分支的最新提交，<code>origin v1.0.0</code>表示远程仓库tag为<code>v1.0.0</code>的那次提交。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>上游分支：本地分支一般会与远程仓库的某个分支相关联，关联的这个远程分支就称作是这个本地分支的上游分支。</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="git-config" class="heading-element"><span>git config</span>
 <a href="#git-config" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>Git配置级别主要有以下3类：</p>
<ol>
<li>
<p>仓库级别local【优先级最高】，对应的文件仓库下的<code>.git/config</code></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>用户级别global【优先级次之】，对应的文件是<code>~/.gitconfig</code></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>系统级别system【优先级最低】</p>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config -l <span class="c1"># 查看所有配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --local -l <span class="c1"># 查看仓库配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global -l <span class="c1"># 用户全局配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --system -l <span class="c1"># 系统配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global user.name &lt;name&gt; <span class="c1"># 设置用户名</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global user.email &lt;email&gt; <span class="c1"># 设置邮箱</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --unset config_name <span class="c1"># 删除某个配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global -e/--edit <span class="c1"># 编辑配置文件，该命令会显示配置文件的路径</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global init.defaultBranch main <span class="c1"># 修改默认分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config pull.rebase <span class="nb">false</span> <span class="c1"># 在一个git仓库中，不带--system和--global参数，配置的就是仓库级别</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-init" class="heading-element"><span>git init</span>
 <a href="#git-init" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git init <span class="c1"># 初始化，采用默认分支名称。默认分支名称可通过 git config 来配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git init -b branch_name <span class="c1"># 初始化，并制定分支名称</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-clone" class="heading-element"><span>git clone</span>
 <a href="#git-clone" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>将远程仓库克隆到本地</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone url <span class="c1"># 克隆某个仓库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone url &lt;local_path&gt; <span class="c1"># 克隆的文件放在指定文件夹下</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone --branch &lt;branch_name/tag_name&gt; url <span class="c1"># 克隆某个分支或标签</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone url <span class="c1"># 只下载最近一次的提交历史，下载完后通过git log也只会看到最近一次提交记录</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone --recursive url</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>当使用<code>git clone</code>命令克隆一个包含子模块的仓库时，Git会克隆主仓库，但不会自动克隆子模块目录中的内容。子模块目录会保留，但会是空的，或者包含指向提交对象的占位符（通常是一个特殊的提交，表示子模块指向的特定版本）。当在<code>git clone</code>命令中加上<code>--recursive</code>参数时，Git不仅会克隆主仓库，还会自动地初始化并克隆仓库中所有的子模块。</p>
<p>如果已经克隆了一个仓库但没有使用<code>--recursive</code>参数，可以在之后通过<code>git submodule update --init --recursive</code>命令来初始化并更新子模块。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># SSH公钥是一种用于身份验证的密钥，它允许用户无需每次访问时都输入密码即可安全地连接到远程服务器或仓库。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ssh-keygen -t rsa -C <span class="s2">&#34;email&#34;</span> <span class="c1"># 生成ssh公钥</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-add" class="heading-element"><span>git add</span>
 <a href="#git-add" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>将文件放入暂存区</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git add . <span class="c1"># 将当前文件夹下的文件和文件夹放入暂存区</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git add file1 file2 <span class="c1"># 将指定文件/文件夹放入暂存区</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-commit" class="heading-element"><span>git commit</span>
 <a href="#git-commit" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>将暂存区中文件提交到版本库</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git commit -m &lt;message&gt; <span class="c1"># 提交暂存区中的文件到版本库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git commit <span class="c1"># 以交互的方式填写提交信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git commit --amend <span class="c1"># 修改最近一次的提交信息，如果此时暂存区中有文件，则暂存区中的文件也会被提交到版本库</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-push" class="heading-element"><span>git push</span>
 <a href="#git-push" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>将版本库中推导远程仓库</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push <span class="c1"># 将当前分支推到上游分支，当前与上游分支的名称一致才可以使用该命令，否则报错提醒名称不匹配</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push origin branch_name <span class="c1"># 将本地main分支(注意不是当前分支)推到远程仓库指定分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push origin &lt;local-branch&gt;:&lt;remote-branch&gt; <span class="c1"># 将本地的指定分支推送到远程仓库的指定分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push -f <span class="c1"># 强制推到远程仓库，比如落后远程仓库时强制推到远程仓库，则会使远程仓库的版本回退</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push origin :branch_name <span class="c1"># 删除远端分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push origin v1.0.0 <span class="c1"># 推送指定标签到远程仓库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push origin --tags <span class="c1"># 推送所有标签到远程仓库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push origin :refs/tags/v1.0.0 <span class="c1"># 删除远程标签</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push -u origin branch_name</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>将本地<code>branch_name</code>分支推到远程仓库的<code>branch_name</code>分支上，并设置当前分支的上游分支为远程仓库的<code>branch_name</code>分支。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push -u origin local-branch:remote-branch</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>将本地<code>local-branch</code>分支推到远程仓库的<code>remote-branch</code>分支上，并设置当前分支的上游分支为远程仓库的<code>branch_name</code>分支。</p>
<div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-pencil-alt fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">先<code>git branch --set-upstream-to</code>再<code>git push</code>与<code>git push -u</code>某些情况下等效。但是<code>git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/branch_name</code>要求<code>origin/branch_name</code>是已存在的分支。而<code>git push -u</code>对于空仓库也可以，它会为这个空仓库创建这个分支并将本地相关分支推上去，同时设置上游分支。</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<h3 id="git-log" class="heading-element"><span>git log</span>
 <a href="#git-log" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git log <span class="c1"># 查看当前分支的log</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git log origin/main <span class="c1"># 查看远程main分支的log</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git log branc_name file_path <span class="c1"># 查看指定分支指定文件的log</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git log --pretty<span class="o">=</span>oneline <span class="c1"># 指定输出格式，一行显示一条记录, 完整的commit id</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git log --oneline <span class="c1"># 指定输出格式，一行显示一条记录, 简短的commit id</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git log --stat <span class="c1"># 会显示哪些文件有修改，修改了多少行或字节(二进制文件)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git log --stat --patch <span class="c1"># 会显示文件具体修改内容</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git log main..origin/main <span class="c1"># 查看远程main分支上但不在本地main分支上的提交 </span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git log origin/main..main <span class="c1"># 查看本地main分支上但不在远程main分支上的提交</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-reflog" class="heading-element"><span>git reflog</span>
 <a href="#git-reflog" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git reflog # 最近几次操作记录 </span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-remote" class="heading-element"><span>git remote</span>
 <a href="#git-remote" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git remote add origin git@github.com:user_name/repository_name.git <span class="c1"># 关联远端仓库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git remote remove origin <span class="c1"># 移除</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git remote -v <span class="c1"># 查看远程仓库地址</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-pencil-alt fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><code>git remote add origin</code>只是关联远程仓库地址，没有获取远程仓库分支的信息；此时运行<code>git branch -r</code>就会发现为空（即使关联的是一个非空仓库），运行命令<code>git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/main</code>也会报错（即使远程仓库存在<code>main</code>分支）。</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<h3 id="git-fetch" class="heading-element"><span>git fetch</span>
 <a href="#git-fetch" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>获取远程仓库最新信息。比如远程仓库已经有一些新的提交，<code>git pull</code>是直接下载最新代码到本地，<code>git fetch</code>不会下载最新的代码，只是获取仓库的最新信息，<code>git fetch</code> 之后可通过<code>git status</code>看到落后上游分支，也可通过<code>git log origin/branch_name</code>查看最新<code>log</code>信息。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git fetch <span class="c1"># 获取当前分支的上游远程仓库（如origin）的最新信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git fetch --all <span class="c1"># 获取所有配置的远程仓库的最新信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git fetch origin <span class="c1"># 获取origin这个远程仓库的最新信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git fetch origin main <span class="c1"># 只获取origin这个远程仓库main分支的信息</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git fetch --unshallow</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>比如<code>git clone --depth 1</code>只会下载最近一次提交记录，现在需要完整的仓库历史记录，可以使用 <code>git fetch --unshallow</code>使其包含完整的提交历史。</p>
<h3 id="git-branch" class="heading-element"><span>git branch</span>
 <a href="#git-branch" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git branch <span class="c1"># 列出所有本地分支，当前分支会有显著标记</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git branch -r <span class="c1"># 查看远程分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git branch name <span class="c1"># 创建分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git branch -d name1 name2 <span class="c1"># 删除分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git branch -D name1 name2 <span class="c1"># 强制删除分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git branch -m new_banch_name <span class="c1"># 重命名当前分支，new_banch_name分支已存在则报错。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git branch -M new_banch_name <span class="c1"># 强制重命名当前分支，即使new_banch_name分时已存在。</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 设置当前分支的上游分支，将当前分支与远程仓库的main分支相关联</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git branch --set-upstream-to<span class="o">=</span>origin/main
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git branch --set-upstream-to<span class="o">=</span>origin/main local_branch <span class="c1"># 设置指定本地分支的上游分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git branch --unset-upstream <span class="c1"># 取消当前分支与上游分支(相关联的远程仓库分支)的关联</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git branch --unset-upstream local_branch <span class="c1"># 取消指定分支的上游分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git branch -v <span class="c1"># 查看本地每个分支，包括分支名、分支最新提交的commit-id和commit-message</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git branch -vv <span class="c1"># 还会显示每个分支的上游分支名称</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-pencil-alt fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><code>git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/branch_name</code>要求远程仓库<code>branch_name</code>分支必须存在，并且本地有远程仓库<code>branch_name</code>分支的信息；也就是说比如通过<code>git remote add origin</code>关联了一个包含<code>branch_name</code>分支的远程仓库之后，还得使用<code>git fetch</code>命令获取<code>branch_name</code>分支的信息，这时<code>git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/branch_name</code>这条命令才会成功。</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<h3 id="git-checkout" class="heading-element"><span>git checkout</span>
 <a href="#git-checkout" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git checkout branch_name <span class="c1"># 切换分支</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-pencil-alt fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><code>git checkout branch_name</code>如果本地分支<code>branch_name</code>不存在，但远程仓库分支<code>branch_name</code>存在，则会自动创建本地分支<code>branch_name</code>并设置上游分支；但如果远程仓库分支<code>branch_name</code>也不存在，那么该命令就会报错。</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git checkout -b branch_name <span class="c1"># 创建并切换分支，不会设置上游分支，即使远程仓库存在同名分支</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-tag" class="heading-element"><span>git tag</span>
 <a href="#git-tag" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git tag <span class="c1"># 查看所有标签</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git tag v1.0.0 <span class="c1"># 轻量级标签 TODO 最新提交，如果有untracked等</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git tag -a v1.0.0 -m <span class="s2">&#34;version 1.0.0&#34;</span> <span class="c1"># 带注释的标签</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git tag -a v1.0.0 <span class="c1"># 带注释的标签，接着Git会提示你输入标签消息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git tag -d v1.0.0 <span class="c1"># 删除本地标签</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-restore" class="heading-element"><span>git restore</span>
 <a href="#git-restore" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git restore --staged . <span class="c1"># 将当前文件夹下的暂存区中的文件和文件夹放回工作区</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git restore --staged file1 file2 <span class="c1"># 将暂存区中的指定文件/文件夹放回工作区</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git restore . <span class="c1"># 撤销对于当前文件夹下的已跟踪文件的修改</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git restore file1 file2 <span class="c1"># 撤销对于指定已跟踪文件的修改</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-clean" class="heading-element"><span>git clean</span>
 <a href="#git-clean" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>git clean</code> 命令在 Git 版本控制系统中用于移除<strong>当前工作目录</strong>中未跟踪的文件和目录。使用 <code>git clean</code> 时需要谨慎，因为它会永久删除这些文件。</p>
<ul>
<li><code>-f</code> 或 <code>--force</code>：强制执行清理操作，不询问确认。</li>
<li><code>-i</code> 或 <code>--interactive</code>：以交互模式运行，让用户选择要删除的文件。</li>
<li><code>-n</code> 或 <code>--dry-run</code>：模拟执行，显示将要删除的文件列表，但不实际删除它们。</li>
<li><code>-d</code>：同时删除未跟踪的目录。默认情况下，<code>git clean</code> 只删除文件。</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clean -f
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clean -fd
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clean -fdn</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-reset" class="heading-element"><span>git reset</span>
 <a href="#git-reset" class="heading-mark">

 </a>

<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">

<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git reset --hard &lt;commit_id&gt;
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git reset --soft origin/main
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git reset --mixed HEAD~1</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

</div><h3 id="git-diff" class="heading-element"><span>git diff</span>
 <a href="#git-diff" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git diff <span class="c1"># 查看当前分支工作区中所有文件与版本库的修改内容</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git diff file_path <span class="c1"># 查看当前分支工作区中指定文件与版本库修改内容</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git diff branch_name file_path <span class="c1"># 查看当前分支指定文件与指定分支的区别</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git diff branch1 branch2 file_path <span class="c1"># 查看指定两个分支最新提交上指定文件的区别</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-pencil-alt fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><p><code>git diff</code>和<code>git diff file_path</code>是工作区中的文件与版本库的比较，不包括暂存区与版本库的比较。</p>
<p><code>git diff branch1 branch2 file_path</code>是版本库上该文件的比较，<code>git diff branch_name file_path</code>是当前分支上的该文件(在版本库、工作区或暂存区都可以)与指定分支版本库之间的比较。</p>
</div>
 </div>
 </div>
