</div><h3 id="git-rebase" class="heading-element"><span>git rebase</span>
 <a href="#git-rebase" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>TODO git rebase</p>
<h3 id="git-stash" class="heading-element"><span>git stash</span>
 <a href="#git-stash" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git stash <span class="c1"># 保存当前工作进度</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git stash -u/--include-untracked <span class="c1"># 只有未跟踪的文件时，需要加该参数才能保存</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-pencil-alt fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">未跟踪的文件、已修改未暂存的文件、暂存区中的文件都会保存。但是如果当前只有未跟踪的文件，需要<code>--include-untracked</code>参数才能保存，否则会提示没有要保存的文件。</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git stash save <span class="s2">&#34;&lt;message&gt;&#34;</span> <span class="c1"># 保存并附带信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git stash list <span class="c1"># 查看所有stash，每个stash前面都有一个编号</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 可以使用stash的编号来应用一个特定的stash，这会将更改应用到你的工作目录，但不会从stash列表中删除它</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 没指定stash编号则应用最新的stash</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git stash apply &lt;stash&gt;
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git stash pop <span class="c1"># 应用最新的stash并删除</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git stash drop &lt;stash&gt; <span class="c1"># 删除一个特定的stash</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git stash clear <span class="c1"># 删除所有stash</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>一个使用场景是，当想切换分支做其它工作时，需先保存一个stash，之后切换回来再应用保存的stash即可。</p>
<h2 id="git-lfs" class="heading-element"><span>Git LFS</span>
 <a href="#git-lfs" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>将大文件从本地提交到Github仓库需要使用<code>git-lfs</code>，见官网：<a href="https://git-lfs.github.com"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://git-lfs.github.com</a></p>
<h2 id="gitignore" class="heading-element"><span>.gitignore</span>
 <a href="#gitignore" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl"># 注释
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">.DS_Store # 忽略该文件
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">*.exe # 所有.exe文件
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">!index.html # 该文件不被忽略
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">test # 忽略名为test的文件或文件夹
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">test/ # 忽略名为test的文件夹
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">/test/ # 根目录下名为test的文件</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>更多详细内容见官网：<a href="https://git-scm.com/docs/gitignore"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://git-scm.com/docs/gitignore</a></p>
<h2 id="常见报错" class="heading-element"><span>常见报错</span>
 <a href="#%e5%b8%b8%e8%a7%81%e6%8a%a5%e9%94%99" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="failed-to-connect" class="heading-element"><span>Failed to connect</span>
 <a href="#failed-to-connect" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="details admonition failure open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-times-circle fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>失败<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">Failed to connect to github.com port 443 after 75002 ms: Couldn&rsquo;t connect to server</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<p>在使用了VPN时，配置http代理，如下，<code>7890</code>是代理的端口号，打开<code>ClashX</code>可以查看使用的端口号</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global http.proxy 127.0.0.1:7890
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global https.proxy 127.0.0.1:7890</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="rpc-failed" class="heading-element"><span>RPC failed</span>
 <a href="#rpc-failed" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="details admonition failure open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-times-circle fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>失败<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">RPC failed; curl 92 HTTP/2 stream 5 was not closed cleanly: CANCEL (err 8)</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<ul>
<li><code>git clone</code>遇到该问题时，有时再运行一遍<code>git clone</code>命令就可以</li>
<li>指定使用<code>http 1.1</code>，<code>git config --global http.version HTTP/1.1</code></li>
</ul>
<div class="details admonition failure open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-times-circle fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>失败<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">RPC failed; curl 18 transfer closed with outstanding read data remaining</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<ul>
<li>使用<code>git clone</code>时，可加参数<code>--depth 1</code></li>
<li>增大缓冲区，<code>git config --global http.postBuffer 536870912</code></li>
<li>多尝试几遍</li>
</ul>

item.title: Hugo博客文章模板-Archetypes
item.description:
<p>用<code>hugo new content</code>命令可以创建一篇文章，<a href="https://gohugo.io/content-management/archetypes/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Archetypes</a>就是新建文章的模板。</p>
<h2 id="hugo-new命令httpsgohugoiocommandshugo_new" class="heading-element"><span><a href="https://gohugo.io/commands/hugo_new/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">hugo new命令</a></span>
 <a href="#hugo-new%e5%91%bd%e4%bb%a4httpsgohugoiocommandshugo_new" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>以<code>hugo new</code>开头的命令有<code>hugo new content</code>、<code>hugo new site</code>等，<code>hugo new</code>默认就是<code>hugo new content</code>，也就是下面两条命令等效。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo new posts/my-new-post.md
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo new content posts/my-new-post.md</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="新建一篇文章" class="heading-element"><span>新建一篇文章</span>
 <a href="#%e6%96%b0%e5%bb%ba%e4%b8%80%e7%af%87%e6%96%87%e7%ab%a0" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="hugo-new-path" class="heading-element"><span>hugo new [path]</span>
 <a href="#hugo-new-path" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo new posts/my-new-post.md</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>上面命令用于创建一个新文件<code>content/posts/my-new-post.md</code>，按照下列顺序寻找模板</p>
<ol>
<li><code>archetypes/posts.md</code></li>
<li><code>themes/my-theme/archetypes/posts.md</code></li>
<li><code>archetypes/default.md</code></li>
<li><code>themes/my-theme/archetypes/default.md</code></li>
</ol>
<p>如果上述文件都不存在，则使用hugo内置的默认模板</p>
<h3 id="hugo-new---kind-name-path" class="heading-element"><span>hugo new &ndash;kind [name] [path]</span>
 <a href="#hugo-new---kind-name-path" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo new --kind <span class="nb">test</span> posts/new-post.md</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>上面命令用于创建一个新文件<code>content/posts/my-new-post.md</code>，按照下列顺序寻找模板</p>
<ol>
<li><code>archetypes/test.md</code></li>
<li><code>themes/my-theme/archetypes/test.md</code></li>
<li><code>archetypes/default.md</code></li>
<li><code>themes/my-theme/archetypes/default.md</code></li>
</ol>
<p>如果上述文件都不存在，则使用hugo内置的默认模板</p>
<h2 id="新建一篇基于目录的文章" class="heading-element"><span>新建一篇基于目录的文章</span>
 <a href="#%e6%96%b0%e5%bb%ba%e4%b8%80%e7%af%87%e5%9f%ba%e4%ba%8e%e7%9b%ae%e5%bd%95%e7%9a%84%e6%96%87%e7%ab%a0" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-pencil-alt fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><a href="https://gohugo.io/content-management/page-bundles/#leaf-bundles"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">一个文件夹对应一篇博客文章</a>这种方式，文章的文件名应该是<code>index.md</code></div>
 </div>
 </div>
<h3 id="hugo-new-path-1" class="heading-element"><span>hugo new [path]</span>
 <a href="#hugo-new-path-1" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo new post-bundle/new-post/</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>上面命令用于创建一个新文件夹<code>content/post-bundle/new-post/</code>，按照下列顺序寻找模板</p>
<ol>
<li><code>archetypes/post-bundle/</code></li>
<li><code>themes/my-theme/post-bundle/</code></li>
</ol>
<p>如果上述文件夹都不存在，则创建失败</p>
<h3 id="hugo-new---kind-name-path-1" class="heading-element"><span>hugo new &ndash;kind [name] [path]</span>
 <a href="#hugo-new---kind-name-path-1" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo new --kind post-bundle posts/new-post/</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>上面命令用于创建一个新文件夹<code>content/posts/new-post/</code>，按照下列顺序寻找模板</p>
<ol>
<li><code>archetypes/post-bundle/</code></li>
<li><code>themes/my-theme/post-bundle/</code></li>
</ol>
<p>如果上述文件夹都不存在，则创建失败</p>
<h2 id="示例" class="heading-element"><span>示例</span>
 <a href="#%e7%a4%ba%e4%be%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>目录结构</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">archetypes
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">├── post-bundle
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">│ └── index.md
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">├── default.md
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">└── posts.md</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>一个文章模版示例</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-markdown" data-lang="markdown"><span class="line"><span class="cl">---
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">title: {{ replace .TranslationBaseName &#34;-&#34; &#34; &#34; | title }}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">subtitle:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">date: {{ .Date }}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">lastmod:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">categories:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">tags:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">collections:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">draft: true
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">---
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c">&lt;!--more--&gt;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div>

item.title: GitHub Pages绑定个人域名
item.description:
<h2 id="购买域名" class="heading-element"><span>购买域名</span>
 <a href="#%e8%b4%ad%e4%b9%b0%e5%9f%9f%e5%90%8d" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>如阿里云、腾讯云、华为云等都可以购买域名，同一个域名不同厂商的价格可能不一样。</p>
<h2 id="域名解析" class="heading-element"><span>域名解析</span>
 <a href="#%e5%9f%9f%e5%90%8d%e8%a7%a3%e6%9e%90" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>以阿里云为例，进入<code>域名控制台</code>，解析新购买的域名。添加下面两条记录，记录值填写Github Pages的原始域名<code>user-name.github.io</code>，记录类型选择<code>CNAME</code>，比如自己的域名是<code>hxhuxin.top</code>，那么主机记录<code>www</code>对应的网址就是<code>www.hxhuxin.top</code>，主机记录<code>@</code>对应的网址是<code>hxhuxin.top</code>。添加完两条记录后，需等待十几分钟。</p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/aliyun.png" alt="aliyun" srcset="./images/aliyun.png?size=small, ./images/aliyun.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/aliyun.png?size=large 2x" data-title="aliyun" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<h2 id="github-pages绑定个人域名" class="heading-element"><span>Github Pages绑定个人域名</span>
 <a href="#github-pages%e7%bb%91%e5%ae%9a%e4%b8%aa%e4%ba%ba%e5%9f%9f%e5%90%8d" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>进入自己博客对应的仓库，打开【Settings】-【 Pages】， 在<code>Custom domain</code>下填写自己的域名后点击<code>Save</code>，<code>Enforce HTTPS</code>选项可以勾选上，强制使用<code>HTTPS</code>。</p>
<blockquote><p>点击<code>Save</code>后可能提示绑定不成功，十几分钟后再试一下即可，域名解析需要等待一定的时间。</p>
</blockquote><p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/github-custom-domain.png" alt="github-custom-domain" srcset="./images/github-custom-domain.png?size=small, ./images/github-custom-domain.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/github-custom-domain.png?size=large 2x" data-title="github-custom-domain" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>

item.title: GitHub+jsDelivr+PicGo搭建免费图床
item.description:
<h2 id="生成一个github-token" class="heading-element"><span>生成一个Github Token</span>
 <a href="#%e7%94%9f%e6%88%90%e4%b8%80%e4%b8%aagithub-token" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>进入Github主页，点击右上角个人头像，【Settings】-【Developer settings】-【Personal access tokens】-【Generate new token】，如下图：</p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/Github-Create-Token.png" alt="Github-Create-Token" srcset="./images/Github-Create-Token.png?size=small, ./images/Github-Create-Token.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/Github-Create-Token.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Github-Create-Token" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<p><code>Note</code>可自定义，勾选<code>repo</code>。生成Token后，复制Token，之后该Token将不可见，如下图：</p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/Github-Token-List.png" alt="Github-Token-List" srcset="./images/Github-Token-List.png?size=small, ./images/Github-Token-List.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/Github-Token-List.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Github-Token-List" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<h2 id="配置picgo" class="heading-element"><span>配置PicGo</span>
 <a href="#%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%aepicgo" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><a href="https://github.com/Molunerfinn/PicGo"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">PicGo</a>安装完成后，打开图床设置，配置GitHub图床，如下图：</p>
<blockquote><p>Tips: Mac系统打开PicGo后并不会看到PicGo的主界面，在菜单栏中找到PicGo图标，右键点击“打开详细窗口”即可打开PicGo主界面。</p>
</blockquote><p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/PicGo.png" alt="PicGo" srcset="./images/PicGo.png?size=small, ./images/PicGo.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/PicGo.png?size=large 2x" data-title="PicGo" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<ul>
<li>设定仓库名：格式是<code>用户名/仓库名</code>，可以新建一个GitHub仓库，专门用作图床</li>
<li>设定分支名：默认分支main即可</li>
<li>设定Token：复制刚刚生成的Token到此处</li>
<li>指定储存路径：如果不填，则之后图片会上传到仓库的根目录下，也可以指定存储路径（路径最后要加<code>/</code>）</li>
<li>设定自定义域名：基于jsDelivr搭建图床，则域名格式为：<a href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/user/repo@version"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/user/repo@version</a>，如<a href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main</a>，设置完成后，即可通过<a href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/user/repo@version/file"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/user/repo@version/file</a>格式访问文件了，如<a href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/PicGo.png"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/star927/Image-Hosting@main/202108/PicGo.png</a></li>
</ul>
<p>配置完PicGo后，之后就可以通过PicGo快速将图片上传至GitHub仓库了。图片成功上传后，PicGo会自动将图片链接复制到粘贴板。PicGo常用的操作是：选定需要上传的图片，<code>Command+C</code>复制图片；<code>Command+Shift+P</code>上传刚刚复制的图片，<code>Command+V</code>获得图片链接。更多PicGo操作可自行探索。</p>

item.title: Jekyll博客中基于LeanCloud统计文章阅读量
item.description:
<h2 id="配置leancloud" class="heading-element"><span>配置LeanCloud</span>
 <a href="#%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%aeleancloud" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>
<p>进入LeanCloud官网<a href="https://www.leancloud.cn/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://www.leancloud.cn/</a>，注册或登录账号。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>创建应用，应用名称可自行设定。</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/LeanCloud-1.png" alt="Create-App" srcset="./images/LeanCloud-1.png?size=small, ./images/LeanCloud-1.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/LeanCloud-1.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Create-App" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<ul>
<li>创建Class，【数据存储】-【结构化数据】-【创建Class】，Class名称与后面相关代码有关，为减少不必要的麻烦，建议将Class名称设置为<code>Counter</code>，其它设置项默认值即可。</li>
</ul>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/LeanCloud-2.png" alt="Create-Class" srcset="./images/LeanCloud-2.png?size=small, ./images/LeanCloud-2.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/LeanCloud-2.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Create-Class" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<p>以后每篇文章的点击量等信息都可在该Class下查看。</p>
<ul>
<li>设置安全域名，【设置】-【安全中心】-【Web安全域名】，填写自己博客的域名即可，在本地调试阶段还可以添加<code>http://127.0.0.1:4000</code></li>
</ul>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/LeanCloud-3.png" alt="Web安全域名" srcset="./images/LeanCloud-3.png?size=small, ./images/LeanCloud-3.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/LeanCloud-3.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Web安全域名" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<ul>
<li>查看<code>App ID</code>和<code>App Key</code>，【设置】-【应用凭证】-【Credentials】，<code>App ID</code>和<code>App Key</code>在后面的配置中会用到。</li>
</ul>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/LeanCloud-4.png" alt="Credentials" srcset="./images/LeanCloud-4.png?size=small, ./images/LeanCloud-4.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/LeanCloud-4.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Credentials" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<ul>
<li>安全设置，【设置】-【安全中心】-【服务开关】，由于<code>App ID</code>和<code>App Key</code>会出现在博客的配置文件中，相当于是公开的，所以有必要进行安全设置，关闭不需要的服务。</li>
</ul>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/LeanCloud-5.png" alt="服务开关" srcset="./images/LeanCloud-5.png?size=small, ./images/LeanCloud-5.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/LeanCloud-5.png?size=large 2x" data-title="服务开关" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<h2 id="修改博客配置文件" class="heading-element"><span>修改博客配置文件</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bf%ae%e6%94%b9%e5%8d%9a%e5%ae%a2%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>需要修改或新增的文件如下：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">├── _config.yml
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">├── _includes
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">│ └── leancloud-analytics.html
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">└── _layouts
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> ├── default.html
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> └── post.html</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="_configyml" class="heading-element"><span>_config.yml</span>
 <a href="#_configyml" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-yml" data-lang="yml"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nt">leancloud</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">enable</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="w"> 
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">app_id</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">xxxxxx </span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">app_key</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">xxxxxx</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>enable</code>是一个总开关，控制LeanCould统计功能是否开启，<code>app_id</code>和<code>app_key</code>对应LeanCloud的<code>App ID</code>和<code>App Key</code></p>
<h3 id="leancloud-analyticshtml" class="heading-element"><span>leancloud-analytics.html</span>
 <a href="#leancloud-analyticshtml" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>

<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span> <span class="na">src</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jquery@3/dist/jquery.min.js&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span> <span class="na">src</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;https://cdn1.lncld.net/static/js/av-core-mini-0.6.1.js&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span><span class="nx">AV</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">initialize</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;{{site.leancloud.app_id}}&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;{{site.leancloud.app_key}}&#34;</span><span class="p">);&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">function</span> <span class="nx">showHitCount</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">Counter</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">query</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">AV</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">Query</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">Counter</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">entries</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">$visitors</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;.leancloud_visitors&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">$visitors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">each</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">push</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="nx">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">this</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">attr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;id&#34;</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">trim</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">containedIn</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;url&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">find</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">done</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">COUNT_CONTAINER_REF</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;.leancloud-visitors-count&#39;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">$visitors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">COUNT_CONTAINER_REF</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="nx">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="nx">i</span><span class="o">++</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">url</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">entries</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nx">i</span><span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">element</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">document</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">getElementById</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">url</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">countSpan</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">element</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">COUNT_CONTAINER_REF</span><span class="p">);</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">});</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">$visitors</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;.leancloud_visitors&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">url</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">$visitors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">attr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;id&#39;</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">trim</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">$visitors</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">attr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;data-flag-title&#39;</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">trim</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">query</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">AV</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">Query</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">Counter</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">equalTo</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;url&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">url</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">find</span><span class="p">({</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">results</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">counter</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">increment</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;hits&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">counter</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">save</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">success</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">counter</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">$element</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">document</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">getElementById</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">url</span><span class="p">));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">$element</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;.leancloud-visitors-count&#39;</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">counter</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;hits&#39;</span><span class="p">));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">},</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">error</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">counter</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">error</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">console</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Failed to save Visitor num, with error message: &#39;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">error</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">newcounter</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">Counter</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="cm">/* Set ACL */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">acl</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">AV</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">ACL</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">acl</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">setPublicReadAccess</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">acl</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">setPublicWriteAccess</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">newcounter</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">setACL</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">acl</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="cm">/* End Set ACL */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">newcounter</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;title&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">title</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">newcounter</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;url&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">url</span><span class="p">);</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">newcounter</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">save</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kc">null</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">success</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">newcounter</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">$element</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">document</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">getElementById</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">url</span><span class="p">));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">$element</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">find</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;.leancloud-visitors-count&#39;</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">newcounter</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;hits&#39;</span><span class="p">));</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">},</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">error</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">newcounter</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">error</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">console</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Failed to create&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">},</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">error</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">error</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">console</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Error:&#39;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">error</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">code</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&#34; &#34;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">error</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kd">function</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">Counter</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">AV</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nb">Object</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">extend</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;Counter&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;.leancloud_visitors&#39;</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="cm">/* in post.html, so add 1 to hit counts */</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">addCount</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">Counter</span><span class="p">);</span>

</div><h3 id="defaulthtml" class="heading-element"><span>default.html</span>
 <a href="#defaulthtml" class="heading-mark">
