 </a>
</h3><p>将下面代码添加进<code>_layouts/default.html</code>文件中，这样每一篇博客中都会加载<code>leancloud-analytics.html</code>文件。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">{% raw %}{% if site.leancloud.enable %}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {% include leancloud-analytics.html %}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{% endif %}{% endraw %}</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="posthtml" class="heading-element"><span>post.html</span>
 <a href="#posthtml" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>想在每篇博客中显示该篇文章的阅读量，可将下面代码添加在<code>_layouts/post.html</code>合适的位置。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl">{% raw %}{% if site.leancloud.enable %}{% endraw %}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">span</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>|<span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">span</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">i</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;far fa-eye&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">i</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">span</span> <span class="na">id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;{{ page.url }}&#34;</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;leancloud_visitors&#34;</span> <span class="na">data-flag-title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;{{ page.title }}&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">span</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;leancloud-visitors-count&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">span</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">span</span> <span class="na">class</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;post-meta-item-text&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>次阅读<span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">span</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">span</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{% raw %}{% endif %}{% endraw %}</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>效果图如下：</p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/LeanCloud-6.png" alt="leancloud-statistic" srcset="./images/LeanCloud-6.png?size=small, ./images/LeanCloud-6.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/LeanCloud-6.png?size=large 2x" data-title="leancloud-statistic" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<p>至此，LeanCloud统计功能配置完毕，登录LeanCloud打开上面创建的Class即可进行后台数据管理。</p>

item.title: Jekyll博客中添加Gitalk评论系统
item.description:
<p>Gitalk评论系统的效果图如下：</p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/gitalk.png" alt="gitalk" srcset="./images/gitalk.png?size=small, ./images/gitalk.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/gitalk.png?size=large 2x" data-title="gitalk" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<p>Gitalk每篇文章的评论对应于Github上的一个Issues，配置完Gitalk后，进入博客对应的Github仓库的Issues，就可以管理评论数据了，下面来配置Gitalk评论系统。</p>
<h2 id="创建github-oauth-apps" class="heading-element"><span>创建Github OAuth Apps</span>
 <a href="#%e5%88%9b%e5%bb%bagithub-oauth-apps" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>进入Github主页，点击右上角个人头像，【Settings】-【Developer settings】-【OAuth Apps】-【New OAuth App】，可看到如下界面：</p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/github-oauth-app.png" alt="github-oauth-app" srcset="./images/github-oauth-app.png?size=small, ./images/github-oauth-app.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/github-oauth-app.png?size=large 2x" data-title="github-oauth-app" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<ul>
<li>Application name: 应用的名字，自定义</li>
<li>Homepage URL: 填写自己博客的URL，如<a href="https://star927.github.io/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://star927.github.io/</a></li>
<li>Application description: 应用描述，选填项</li>
<li>Authorization callback URL: 与Homepage URL一样即可</li>
</ul>
<p>如果Github Pages已经绑定了个人域名，则<code>Homepage URL</code>和<code>Authorization callback URL</code>需要填写自己的域名，如<a href="https://hxhuxin.top/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://hxhuxin.top/</a></p>
<h2 id="在jekyll中配置gitalk" class="heading-element"><span>在Jekyll中配置Gitalk</span>
 <a href="#%e5%9c%a8jekyll%e4%b8%ad%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%aegitalk" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>需要修改文件如下：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">├── _config.yml
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">├── _includes
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">│ └── head.html
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">└── _layouts
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> └── post.html</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="_configyml" class="heading-element"><span>_config.yml</span>
 <a href="#_configyml" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>在<code>_config.yml</code>文件中添加以下代码：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-yml" data-lang="yml"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nt">gitalk</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">enable</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c"># 总开关，控制gitalk功能是否开启</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">clientId</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">申请的OAuth App的Client ID </span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">clientSecret</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">申请的OAuth App的Client ID</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">repo</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">博客对应的仓库名称</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">owner</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">自己的Github用户名</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">admin</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">自己的Github用户名</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">distractionFreeMode</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="c"># 若设置为true，则当在评论框输入时，周围区域会变暗</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>repo是自己博客对应的仓库的名称，如<code>star927.github.io</code>，而不是该仓库的URL</p>
<h3 id="headhtml" class="heading-element"><span>head.html</span>
 <a href="#headhtml" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>找到自己博客<code>&lt;head&gt;</code>标签所在的文件，如<code>_includes/head.html</code>，在<code>&lt;/head&gt;</code>标签前添加以下代码。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl">{% raw %}{% if page.layout == &#39;post&#39; and site.gitalk.enable %}{% endraw %}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">link</span> <span class="na">rel</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;stylesheet&#34;</span> <span class="na">href</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/gitalk@1/dist/gitalk.css&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{% raw %}{% endif %}{% endraw %}</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="posthtml" class="heading-element"><span>post.html</span>
 <a href="#posthtml" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>在<code>_layouts/post.html</code>文件的适当位置添加以下代码，这样每篇博客最后都会有Gitalk评论区。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">div</span> <span class="na">id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;gitalk-container&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">div</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span> <span class="na">src</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/gitalk@1/dist/gitalk.min.js&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kr">const</span> <span class="nx">gitalk</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">Gitalk</span> <span class="p">({</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">id</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="nb">window</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">location</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">pathname</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">clientID</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.gitalk.clientId }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">clientSecret</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.gitalk.clientSecret }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">repo</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.gitalk.repo }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">owner</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.gitalk.owner }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">admin</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.gitalk.admin }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">],</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">distractionFreeMode</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.gitalk.distractionFreeMode }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">gitalk</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">render</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;gitalk-container&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span> </span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>上述步骤完成后，在评论区如果出现问题 <strong>Error: Not Found.</strong>（如下图），请仔细检查代码是否有误。</p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/gitalk-error-not-found.png" alt="gitalk-error-not-found" srcset="./images/gitalk-error-not-found.png?size=small, ./images/gitalk-error-not-found.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/gitalk-error-not-found.png?size=large 2x" data-title="gitalk-error-not-found" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<h2 id="初始化gitalk" class="heading-element"><span>初始化Gitalk</span>
 <a href="#%e5%88%9d%e5%a7%8b%e5%8c%96gitalk" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>正确完成上述步骤后，在评论区可看到以下内容，点击<code>使用Github登录</code>即可。</p>
<blockquote><p>必须将上述代码的修改提交到Github上，通过<a href="https://your-user-name.github.io/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://your-user-name.github.io/</a>或者自己已绑定的域名访问自己的博客，再点击<code>使用Github登录</code>，而不是在本地服务器<a href="http://127.0.0.1:4000/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">http://127.0.0.1:4000/</a>点击<code>使用Github登录</code>。</p>
</blockquote><p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/gitalk-init.png" alt="gitalk-init" srcset="./images/gitalk-init.png?size=small, ./images/gitalk-init.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/gitalk-init.png?size=large 2x" data-title="gitalk-init" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<p>登录自己的Github账号后，就可以看到Gitalk评论区了。</p>

item.title: Jekyll博客中添加Valine评论系统
item.description:
<p>Valine评论系统的效果图如下：</p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/Valine.png" alt="Valine" srcset="./images/Valine.png?size=small, ./images/Valine.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/Valine.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Valine" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<p>下面一步步来配置Valine评论系统</p>
<h2 id="配置leancloud" class="heading-element"><span>配置LeanCloud</span>
 <a href="#%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%aeleancloud" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>
<p>进入LeanCloud官网<a href="https://www.leancloud.cn/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://www.leancloud.cn/</a>，注册/登录账号。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>创建应用，应用名称可自行设定。</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/LeanCloud-1.png" alt="Create-App" srcset="./images/LeanCloud-1.png?size=small, ./images/LeanCloud-1.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/LeanCloud-1.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Create-App" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<ul>
<li>查看<code>App ID</code>和<code>App Key</code>，【设置】-【应用凭证】-【Credentials】，<code>App ID</code>和<code>App Key</code>在后面的配置中会用到。</li>
</ul>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/LeanCloud-4.png" alt="Credentials" srcset="./images/LeanCloud-4.png?size=small, ./images/LeanCloud-4.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/LeanCloud-4.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Credentials" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<h2 id="修改博客配置文件" class="heading-element"><span>修改博客配置文件</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bf%ae%e6%94%b9%e5%8d%9a%e5%ae%a2%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>在<code>_config.yml</code>文件中添加以下代码：</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-yml" data-lang="yml"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nt">valine</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">enable</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kc">true</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">app_id</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">xxxxxx</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">app_key</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">xxxxxx</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>enable</code>是一个总开关，控制Valine评论功能是否开启，<code>app_id</code>和<code>app_key</code>对应LeanCloud的<code>App ID</code>和<code>App Key</code>。
更多配置项参见官方文档：<a href="https://valine.js.org/configuration.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://valine.js.org/configuration.html</a></p>
<ul>
<li>创建<code>valine.html</code>文件，放在<code>_includes</code>文件夹下，代码如下：</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-html" data-lang="html"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span> <span class="na">src</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#39;//unpkg.com/valine/dist/Valine.min.js&#39;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">div</span> <span class="na">id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">&#34;vcomments&#34;</span><span class="p">&gt;&lt;/</span><span class="nt">div</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">Valine</span><span class="p">({</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">el</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;#vcomments&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">appId</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.valine.app_id }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">appKey</span><span class="o">:</span> <span class="s1">&#39;{% raw %}{{ site.valine.app_key }}{% endraw %}&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">})</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">&lt;/</span><span class="nt">script</span><span class="p">&gt;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>在需要添加Valine评论的地方添加以下代码，如<code>_layouts/post.html</code>文件</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">{% raw %}{% if site.valine.enable %}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> {% include valine.html %}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">{% endif %}{% endraw %}</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>至此Valine评论系统配置完毕。打开对应的LeanCloud应用，在【数据存储】-【结构化数据】-【Comment&lt;/&gt;】中可查看和管理所有评论数据。</p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./images/Valine-Comment.png" alt="Valine-Comment" srcset="./images/Valine-Comment.png?size=small, ./images/Valine-Comment.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./images/Valine-Comment.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Valine-Comment" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<h2 id="配置valine邮件提醒功能" class="heading-element"><span>配置Valine邮件提醒功能</span>
 <a href="#%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%aevaline%e9%82%ae%e4%bb%b6%e6%8f%90%e9%86%92%e5%8a%9f%e8%83%bd" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>详见<a href="https://github.com/DesertsP/Valine-Admin"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://github.com/DesertsP/Valine-Admin</a></p>
